Pre-Game Insights: India will look to bounce back and level the series, while West Indies have a great chance to take a 2-0 lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win in the first game was the eighth win for West Indies over India in the shorter format.
On the other hand, Team India have registered 17 wins against the Caribbean team, while one game ended without a result between both the teams.
The pitch at Providence Stadium is slow and low, and spinners and slow bowlers will enjoy this venue.
The average first-inning score here is 122.
